#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define int long long
using namespace std;
int n,a[100001];
int f(int x)
{
    int s1 = 0,s2 = 0;
    for(int i = 1; i<=n; i++){
        if(x>a[i])
            s1 += x-a[i];
        else
            s2 += a[i]-x;
    }
    return s1+s2;
}
main()
{
    cin >> n;
    for(int i = 1; i<=n; i++){
        cin >> a[i];
    }
    int l = 0,r = 1e9;
    while(r - l > 2){
        int m1 = l + (r - l)/3;
        int m2 = r - (r - l)/3;
        if(f(m1)>f(m2))
            l = m1;
        else
            r = m2;
    }
    int mn = 0,d = 1e18;
    for(int i = l; i <= r; i++){
        if(f(i) < d){
            d = f(i);
            mn = i;
        }
    }
    cout << d << " " << mn;
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
double l,r;
double f(double a)
{
    double h = sqrt(l*l-(r-a)*(r-a));
    return acos(-1)*h*(a*a+r*r+r*a)/3;
}
main()
{
    cin >> l >> r;
    r /= 2;
    double L = r, R = l+r, m1, m2;
    for(int i = 1; i<150; i++){
        m1 = L + (R - L)/3;
        m2 = R - (R - L)/3;
        if(f(m1)>f(m2))
            R = m2;
        else
            L = m1;
    }
    printf("%.6f",f(m1));
}
